snippet.title: Paralives - Gameplay Overview
snippet.description:
Meet Anisa and follow her journey as she moves into a new apartment, finds a job and improves her skills while making new connections! 

➡️ Read more about the Live Mode gameplay and the Early Access release in this public Patron post: https://www.patreon.com/posts/98031014 

✅ Don’t miss Paralives’ Early Access release and wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1118520/Paralives/  

Key features in this video:
🔹Jobs and careers
🔹Needs and wants
🔹Relationships
🔹Personality system
🔹Group interactions

✅ Don’t miss Paralives’ Early Access release and wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1118520/Paralives/   

🎁 Support the development on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/alexmasse 
Paralives is entirely funded by the community; a monthly pledge of 3$ helps us cover the development fees and gets you cool rewards!

🗣️ Join our Discord community to share your ideas: http://discord.gg/paralives 

#Paralives #LifeSim
